M14/1/AXGEO/HP1/GEO/TZ0/XX




      22140541

GEORGIAN A: LITERATURE – HIGHER LEVEL – PAPER 1
GÉORGIEN A : LITTéRATURE – NIVEAU SUPÉRIEUR – ÉPREUVE 1
GEORGIANO A: LITERATURA – NIVEL SUPERIOR – PRUEBA 1

Friday 9 May 2014 (morning)
Vendredi 9 mai 2014 (matin)
Viernes 9 de mayo de 2014 (mañana)

2 hours / 2 heures / 2 horas


Instructions to candidates
 Do not open this examination paper until instructed to do so.
 Write a literary commentary on one passage only.
 The maximum mark for this examination paper is [20 marks].

INSTRUCTIONS DESTINÉES AUX CANDIDATS
 N’ouvrez pas cette épreuve avant d’y être autorisé(e).
 Rédigez un commentaire littéraire sur un seul des passages.
 Le nombre maximum de points pour cette épreuve d’examen est [20 points].

INSTRUCCIONES PARA LOS ALUMNOS
 No abra esta prueba hasta que se lo autoricen.
 Escriba un comentario literario sobre un solo pasaje.
 La puntuación máxima para esta prueba de examen es [20 puntos].

dawereT erT-erTi teqstis literaturuli komentari:

1.

                 leninma gansakuTrebuli saxeli uwoda stalins _ `legendaruli
            qarTveli.~ legendaruli Warbad iyo stalinSi, oRond qarTuli _ meCxrad
            … stalini mxolod imdenad iyo qarTveli,   ramdenadac sapirispiro polusi
            iyo qarTvelobisa.
      5          preistoriuli xvlikis gaqvavebuli Tavi _ ase daaxasiaTa igi erTma
            yofilma TanamSromelma, romelmac, mgoni, arc ki icoda, rogor zustad
            moartya mizans … mTels mis arsebaSi ubedurebis momtanis civi sisxli
            igrZnoboda, romelic mzakvrobiT yvelas ajobebs.           misi mzeris winaSe
            yoveli neba ukan ixevda.
     10          stalini gveliviT icvlida kans da amiT xelSeuxeblad inaxavda Sinagan
            arsebas. magram Tavdacvis sxva xerxic hqonda: sinamdvilis gabiabrueba.
            erTxel baqos cixeSi politikuri patimrebi aiZules rozgebmomarjvebuli
            jariskacebis mwkrivebs Soris gaevloT.          stalinmac gaiara _ magram
            rogor? xelSi broSura eWira _ uTuod marqsistuli _ kiTxulobda da
     15     ise miabijebda, TiTqos mas araferi exeboda. damsjelebis abuCad agdebiT
            sakuTari pirovneba moraluri Seuracxyofisagan ixsna. aq ukve napovni
            hqonda Tavisi namdvili stiqia …
                 sicocxlis mimarT mtrulad iyo ganwyobili da yvelgan mtrebi
            elandeboda. mtris dasaZlevad ori ram aris saWiro: TavdaWera da ironia.
     20     stalinis TavdaWera iogebisas hgavda, xolo misi ironia ubadlo iyo.
            nela, gaunZrevlad, gulgrilad aRizianebda igi mowinaaRmdeges, aqezebda,
            dascinoda, wyobidan gamohyavda. is ciliswamebiTa da damcirebiT spobda
            Tavis mtrebs … iyo Tu ara boroti Cveulebrivi azriT? ara. is ar yofila
            mkvleli, arc yaCaRi, arc aranairi damnaSave. piriqiT: saukeTeso surda
     25     adamianebisaTvis _ da mainc: mis xasiaTSi imTaviTve raRac ucxo
            gvaris boroti Tesli budobda.          iqneb pirad siamovnebas mieltvoda?
            sulac ara. miwieri siamovnebani _ qali, Rvino, azartuli TamaSi, fuli _ ar
            arsebobda misTvis. niSneulia, rom qarTul lxinSi, sadac mudam dionises
            adideben, roca yvela sxva Tvreboda, is erTaderTi, fxizeli rCeboda.
     30     is guluxvi iyo, ramdenadac ki SeeZlo aseTi yofiliyo, da daxmarebisTvis
            mudam mzad iyo, viTarca sulieri moZRvari da mainc aravisTan iyo axlo.
            ar hyolia arc erTi megobari,   radgan aseTi vinme _ megobaric rom yofiliyo
            _ samudamod mis qveSevrdomad unda darCeniliyo. SesaZloa, es gulis
            siRrmeSi awuxebda kidec. SeiZleba xandaxan Trgunavda sakuTari xasiaTi.
     35     aseT wuTebSi iqneb Rrma kaeSani i pyrobda. magram Zneli dasajerebelia,  rom
            es kaeSani Tundac erTi wamiT sxvebisTvis gaemxila. mudam raRac xels
            uSlida guli gaexsna …
                 damarcxebulni qeds ixridnen mis winaSe, iCoqebdnen da codvebs
            inaniebdnen. `legendaruli qarTvelis~ gamarjvebebi yvelas ukvirda da
     40     leninis mier Serqmeul am metsaxels axla yvela yuradRebiT akvirdeboda.
            ukvirdaT da ver gaegoT: rogor?          saidan aseTi Zala am velur, uxeS
            kavkasielSi?    maT ver gaegoT, rom stalinis bolSevikur fsiqikaSi
            dauSreteli instinqtebi kvebavdnen racios. swored es iyo gadamwyveti
            gamarjvebisTvis. gamarjveba gamarjvebas mosdevda, stalini dRiTi dRe
     45     izrdeboda da veraviTari Zala veRar ajobebda mas …

2214-0541
                                           –3–              M14/1/AXGEO/HP1/GEO/TZ0/XX

                 yvela aRtacebuli iyo imiT,   rom mas ar izidavda miwieri siamovnebani
            … magram ver amCnevdnen, rom stalins srulebiT ar sWirdeboda asketizmi:
            aseTi raRaceebisTvis mas ubralod organo aklda … dostoevskis sityvebs:
            `jojoxeTi aris tkivili imis gamo, rom aRar ZalgiZs siyvaruli~, yvelaze
   50       meti Tavsatexi unda gaeCina misTvis.      mas ar hqonda siyvarulis niWi.
            aq daeRo xaxa uRrmes sicarieles misi kaeSnisas, damnaSaveobis Seuval
            niRabs rom amohfareboda.
                 saqmeebSi Cafluli stalini kremlSi ijda, Zalauflebis patroni,
            magram ara xelmwife, arseba da ara adamiani, revoluciuri Zalebis
   55       eleqtrogayvaniloba     gamafrTxilebeli       warweriT   `momakvdinebelia.~
            masTan telefoniT saubaric ki yvelas Trgunavda.               misi saSiSi
            zemoqmedebisagan aravin iyo dazRveuli. sisastikiT aRsavse Zlevamosilad
            aRmarTuliyo, rogorc sabWoeTis _ da,   SesaZloa,   mTeli msoflios _ civi
            da brma bediswera. roca xandaxan idumali kontaqti gadairTveboda, roca
   60       is _ Seudrekeli _ droebiT denis qselidan gamobobRdeboda daretianebuli
            da gaucxoebuli, roca SeSinebuli grZnobda, rogor ecleboda Rone,
            ai, maSin stalini mxolod soso juRaSvili iyo, ubralo qarTveli.
            maSin axsendeboda Soreuli saqarTvelo, romlisganac esRa Semoenaxa:
            sacivisa da kaxuri Rvinis gemo, mravalJamieris hangi da qarTuli gineba:
   65       `magaTi deda ki vatire.~

                                                 grigol robaqiZe, Cakluli suli (1933)




2214-0541                                          Turn over / Tournez la page / Véase al dorso
                              –4–           M14/1/AXGEO/HP1/GEO/TZ0/XX

2.

                 mTebi varskvlavebs barSi mwyemsavdnen,
                 bnelSi ganrTxmuli idga zegani.
                 da Tqva iesom: `mamlis mesame
                 dayivlebamde erTi Tqvengani
             5   miRalatebso …~ _ miRalatebso?
                 da SekrTa maSin Cveni seroba,
                 TiTqos sufraze uceb dagveswro
                 TviT angareba da pirferoba …
                 qriste ki CxiriT qeqavda nacars,
            10   dasTamaSebda pirze Rimili
                 da mwifdeboda, Ralatis msgavsad,
                 fanjris gadaRma mamlis yivili.
                 vdumdiT. dumilma suli daRala.
                 iwureboda daTqmuli vada.
            15   da daiyivla erTxel mamalma
                 da is yivili gasrolas gavda.
                 mere movarda sio frTamali,
                 dafliTa Savi Rrublebis farCa,
                 ukve meored yivis mamali,
            20   moRalate ki ar Cans da ar Cans.
                 nuTu motyuvda, Secda moZRvari,
                 brZeni, misani, sulis Tamada?
                 gacamtverdeba myis salocavi,
                 misi naTqvami Tu ar gamarTlda.
            25   veRar uSvelis daRupul imeds
                 veraviTari locva-RaRadi,
                 mokvdeba RmerTi, Tu axla vinmem
                 ar Caidina CvenSi Ralati!
                 unda viTavo es umZimesi
            30   saqme _ gaviRo msxverpli saCino:
                 unda gavwiro kaci _ ieso,
                 qriste RmerTi rom gadavarCino!
                 Cqara! … cis kides varskvlavi moswyda,
                 zeca gawiTlda, rogorc mocxari …
            35   da me avdeqi, vakoce moZRvars
                 da jalaTebma icnes moZRvari!


                                  mixeil qvliviZe, iudas monologi (1966)
